TableView.name: ACP.EXT_Recrui.ngOrgs
TableView.userDefinedSQL: SELECT roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS root, roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID AS HQ, roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, null AS District, null AS RS, null AS RSS, null AS OSS, roHQ.Name AS HQ_Name, roRegion.Name AS Region_Name, null AS District_Name, null AS RS_Name, null AS RSS_Name, null AS OSS_Name FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRegion WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om ON roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roHQ ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE roRegion.Organiza.on_Type = 'R' UNION SELECT roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID AS root, roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID AS HQ, roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID AS District, null AS RS, null AS RSS, null AS OSS, roHQ.Name AS HQ_Name, roRegion.Name AS Region_Name, roDistrict.Name AS District_Name, null AS RS_Name, null AS RSS_Name, null AS OSS_Name FROM MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roDistrict ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRegion ON om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roHQ ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE roDistrict.Organiza.on_Type = 'D' UNION SELECT roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID AS root, roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID AS HQ, roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID AS District, roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS, null AS RSS, null AS OSS, roHQ.Name AS HQ_Name, roRegion.Name AS Region_Name, roDistrict.Name AS District_Name, roRs.Name AS RS_Name, null AS RSS_Name, null AS OSS_Name FROM MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRs ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roDistrict ON om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRegion ON om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roHQ ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE roRs.Organiza.on_Type = 'RS' UNION SELECT roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID AS root, roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID AS HQ, roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID AS District, roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS, roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RSS, null AS OSS, roHQ.Name AS HQ_Name, roRegion.Name AS Region_Name, roDistrict.Name AS District_Name, roRs.Name AS RS_Name, roRss.Name AS RSS_Name, null AS OSS_Name FROM MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om4 ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om4.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRss ON om4.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRs ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roDistrict ON om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRegion ON om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roHQ ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE roRss.Organiza.on_Type = 'RSS' UNION SELECT roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID AS root, roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID AS HQ, roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID AS Region, roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID AS District, roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID AS RS, null AS RSS, roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OSS, roHQ.Name AS HQ_Name, roRegion.Name AS Region_Name, roDistrict.Name AS District_Name, roRs.Name AS RS_Name, null AS RSS_Name, roRss.Name AS OSS_Name FROM MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om4 ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om4.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRss ON om4.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRss.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRs ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRs.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roDistrict ON om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roDistrict.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roRegion ON om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roRegion.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roHQ ON om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = roHQ.ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE roRss.Organiza.on_Type = 'OSS'
